（火渡）さっさと起きやがれ

en_text: From here on, you are not a Re-extermination squad.
jp_text:
（火渡）
いいか てめえら
こっからは再殺部隊じゃねえ
google_translated:
Good morning
It is not a rebuilding unit

en_text: Yes?
jp_text:
（火渡）おう 毒島
（毒島）はい

en_text: We'll be going with our combination attack next time!
jp_text:
（火渡）
てめえと俺とのツープラトン技
次はいくぜ
google_translated:
Top Laton technique with me
Next

en_text: lt still isn't clear...
jp_text: （毒島）ううう…

en_text: who the person that appeared before me at that time was.
jp_text:
（斗貴子）
あの時 私の前に現れた者が
何者かは―
google_translated:
At that time the person who appeared before
Someone-

en_text: A strange man and an underground space.
jp_text: 謎の男に地下空間
google_translated: Underground space for a mysterious man

en_text: That is where l got Kazuki's kakugane.
jp_text:
カズキの核鉄は
あそこで手に入れたものだ
google_translated:
Kazuki's nuclear iron
It's what I got there

en_text: l'm sure the secret behind the black kakugane is also there as well.
jp_text:
黒い核鉄に関する秘密は
きっとある
google_translated:
Secret about black nuclear iron
Surely

en_text: Bravo sacrificed himself to save my life.
jp_text: ブラボーが守ってくれた命だ
google_translated: It is the life that Bravo protected

en_text: We're off for the Newton Apple Girls Academy.
jp_text:
目指すは
ニュートンアップル女学院
google_translated:
Aiming to
Newton Apple Women's Academy

en_text: and the existence of a new kakugane is revealed.
jp_text:
（斗貴子）
黒い核鉄の謎が明かされ
新たな核鉄の存在が明らかとなる
google_translated:
Mystery of black nuclear iron is revealed
The presence of new nuclear iron becomes clear

en_text: We're told Kazuki can be returned to normal if that is used...
jp_text:
それを使えば
カズキを元に戻せるというのだな
google_translated:
If you use it
It is said that Kazuki can be restored

en_text: Next, "A Decision ls Required."
jp_text: 次回 「決断を要す」

en_text: I'll splatter your guts!
jp_text: はらわたをぶちまけろ！
